en: I've been looking at some statistics...I'm a bit worried. We aren't retaining our beta-testers.
I've narrowed down two possible solutions.
We could simplify the interface so it's easier to use, though it would be costly. Alternatively, we could ramp up our notifications if we believe the product hasn't been used for a while.
The first is damaging to the wallet, the second damaging to the brand. What do you think?
I would have made the same choice. That should pay off in the future.
All right. We'll go the simple yet annoying route.
